str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
A primary preposition; 'fore', i.e. In front of, prior to.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
To come, go.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
The same as Iakob Graecized; Jacobus, the name of three Israelites.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To eat with. From sun and esthio; to take food in company with.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To come, go.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From hupo and stello; to withhold under, i.e. to cower or shrink, to conceal.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To rail off, separate, place apart. From apo and horizo; to set off by boundary, i.e. limit, exclude, appoint, etc.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: Himself, herself, itself.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From phobos; to frighten, i.e. to be alarmed; by analogy, to be in awe of, i.e. Revere.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Circumcision. From peritemno; circumcision.
